caption: Words can’t describe how much I loved this restaurant. I have only visited once after visiting the aquarium with family. The pizza tasted phenomenal, we had the Pesto Burrata pizza and the Meat Lover’s pizza and both were delicious. Each pizza had very generous amounts of toppings. The pizzas were large in the sense that one would be enough for two people to share and be satisfied, but also if you’re really hungry you might be able to eat an entire one on your own. The atmosphere was wonderful, being able to sit and see the wood fire stove from our table really set the ambiance. I also love that they served all their drinks in jars adding to the aesthetic. All the employees there were also very friendly and our server was wonderful and very kind. If you’re ever craving really good pizza I would definitely recommend coming here.
They offer some of the best pizzas I've ever eaten
Food was fresh and good very nice work customer service was great.
Delicious

My boyfriend and I went here for the first time, and we weren’t disappointed! We got the pico bread and mini meatballs to start, and both were amazing (by the way, the meatballs were definitely bigger than mini)! We then got the prosciutto and arugula pizza along with the Italiano Piccante pizza; both were great! Then we ended with gelato and a chocolate chip cookie which just made the meal even better! We will definitely be back again!
My lady and I ordered the three cheese pizza and a large Caesar salad and everything was delish...
Best meatball I've ever had. Everything is made with high quality and fresh ingredients. Love it!
Good pizza, really like the Italian beef pizza the dough could use some improvement.
Excellent food and service.    We live down the street so it's great.    Thanks for being open and providing amazing comfort food during all this  Covid--19 craziness!
Very nice atmosphere. Great service.

Best pizza I’ve tried in Chicago! Great service! Specifically Jose, he took good care in providing us suggestions and details on options on the menu. The place was full and he managed all of us in the the outdoor section very well. Thanks Jose!  The restaurant is beautiful and clean. We appreciated the measures taken to keep us all safe. We enjoyed 2 pizzas and it was enough to share. They are next to their Red Line Cafe and you can order good quality coffee and baked goods. All round a great place!
Gr8 pizza! Excellent service!

Three pizzas for $30 on Wednesday is a great way to try some of the more adventurous pies on the menu! Great deal and super friendly staff. Patio out front makes for nice al fresco dining, but they also have a huge garage door that opens out front so you’ll be able to safely dine inside when the weather is chilly or raining!
Great smoothie
Combined restaurant with RedLine cafe. Stubbies are mini 3-inch sándwiches. Blocks from the ballpark. Food was tasty and friendly service ! Has small outdoor patio.
What a great place to eat . Super clean and  service is excellent . Very cozy  family atmosphere.  I will definitely come back .  I highly recommend BBQ PIZZA is my favorite 😋
Solid pizza/sandwich/coffee place in the shadows of Comiskey. Friendly service, interesting local beers on tap. This Cubs fan is a frequent customer!

Tried to order online for delivery. I am in a 5 minute radius but it says I’m too far. On the phone, they suggested using the Caviar app. App charged me $50 and did not submit my order. I have to walk 10 minutes to my car, drive 5 minutes, pick up order, drive back for 5 minutes, walk with my hands full for 10 minutes. Ended up with paying a total of $80 for two pizzas and being charged to be a pizza delivery man. They also made sure to default to giving a 15% tip for pickup. It really doesn’t need to be $90+ for two pizzas.  It’s just pizza, not worth this.
Food and service was great as usual and it was very nice to be able to eat inside now too
Lovely people. Charming decor. Delicious wood fired pizzas, yummy meatballs, and fresh salads. We were passing through on a cross country trip and were lucky to find this place.
Over priced. Way too spicey. I will never reccomend this place nor will I ever patronize this place. 👎

This place is absolutely amazing! I dont think they get enough recognition but they should. Their pizzas are always cooked to perfection: perfect crust, perfect sauce. All their ingredients are fresh and homemade.
Awesome. Just awesome.
Honestly, I had high Hope's. The pizzas I ordered with my date were very underwhelming.  Sorry but I wont be going back
A hidden gem! Fresh salads and pizza
Delicious food, cute place

Cozy little place with easy access off the expressway right next to Comiskey. Found plenty of free parking spots nearby but I'm sure not the case during baseball games. Very good food at affordable pricing with fast and friendly service from the staff.
These guys know what theyre doing
Amazing food, always the best customer service. Pizza Tower Wednesday is a deal that can't be beat!
Food is great and service is excellent
Excellent service really good pizza

The food and service were excellent. We trued the giardiniera and it was outstanding. Prices were on par with similar establishments. Give them a try. With so many great choices, you won't be disappointed!
The pesto burrata is fantastic!
I had an Apple salad which was good just a little to much vinegarette. I also had a half of Grilled Chicken Stubby which was delicious and made to perfection.
It's a major place to eat for my family when it comes to pizza! Wood fire oven brings an amazing taste!

The food is delicious; they have salads, pastas, sandwiches and of course the wood fired pizza is amazing! Thanks to the owner Mario and the staff for being so welcoming. The atmosphere is rustic yet modern. Very clean and comfortable place to spend an evening with family and friends. I highly recommend this place.
Great tasting pizza. Washed it down with a Three Floyds Zombie Dust.  OUTSTANDING! I'll be back here again.
Great service, excellent food! Would recommend and would come back. Real neopolitan style.
Great pizzas, great smoothies, great service. What else do you need? I suggest everyone to come in and enjoy your time at Stix and Brix.

Terrific wood-fired pizza. The burratta was surprisingly cold, and both pizzas - as well as the pasta we ordered - could have had a wee bit more garlic and spice, but the food was good, the service was great and the open windows looking kitty-corner into Armour Park were lovely. Also, there were three local beers on tap! We dn't try any deserts, but we'll be back!
Simple but High quality products. Good for the neighborhood

A small but great place to hangout with friends and family. Must try out their different varieties of Pizzas made in the fire wood oven that is visible to all guests seated inside the restaurant and IPA beers. Excellent ambience spacious, courteous staff. Not so expensive place but value for money in all ways. A must try restaurant in Bridgeport.
Pre-game lunch. I've been wanting to try this place out on the Southside. For the price of a ballpark beer and Brat I ate this instead. #WhiteSox Hidden gem across the street from the ballpark

Loved this place! Three 10" pizzas for $30 was a steal! Loved the prosciutto and arugala pizza and the pesto pizza the best, if they served alcohol it would have paired nicely with a light red wine, but if they did, they'd never get rid of me!
Great place to enjoy wood fire pizza before a White Sox game. The sausage pizza was spicy and delicious. The BBQ chicken was also excellent
Pepperoni pizza was great!

Service was good - server was as attentive as expected. Food was of average quality. Price on the bill did not match up with menu prices, and on top of that there was a $3 upcharge for my wife's gluten free crust.
The burger and garlic fries that we had there were absolutely amazing! Definately would recommend!
Great pizza

We went there for dinner before a baseball game.  No line-up about 1hr before the game.  It's within easy walking distance of Guaranteed Field.  The food was great.  The service was below average and slow for a not busy restaurant.  The server walked past my empty water glass placed out on the empty table to my side 4 times before I asked for a refill.  She then refilled it with slightly cooled water with no ice.  The prices we were charged for the pizza was different then then menu, about $1.50 more per pizza. EDIT: I didn't take a picture of the bill, so I don't know if what you are saying is correct or not.  My recollection is that the pizza was ~$12.50 in the menu but showed as ~$14.00 on the bill.  On the bill, below the line for the pizza was a separate line for tax.  It's possible that there was not an additional line for tax, but that would mean that you have the only receipt I've ever seen that adds tax to each individual menu item.

Staff was very friendly, however, food was mediocre at best and service was incredibly slow. I understand it was before the Cubs/Sox game, but understaffing is not an excuse when there is only one server for the entire restaurant (indoors and outdoors).
Great pizza！I have tried almost every kind of pizza in several meals and they never make me disappointed！

Best Margarita pizza in chicago. Our server, April was great. She even helped some other customers from out of town who were stuck a ride home on a Lyft. Ordered the ride from her own account. Never seen service like that before.
Great pizza, food, and service

Decent Wood fired pizza close to Sox Park. They also have salads, pasta, sammiches etc. Attached to a coffee place that has good selections. The pizza is Parlor Pizza bar level. Not great but not bad either. A decent selection of desserts. Not a destination but a good place to eat before the game.
Best service EVER!  Seriously, the waitress there was on top of everyone and everything in the place.  Oh yeah, and the pizza was also top notch.
So good. Perfect for ballgame.
It wasn't Chicago style pizza
Loves great place to hang before a game! Beer prices are sweet and I will be back again.
Apple salad!
Yummy pizza and desserts. I have been here a few times and I had a great experience each time. Street parking.
Delicious :)
Great pizza
Great tasting healthy food, but it's a little expensive.
Pizza and service were excellent
Got an Apple salad 🥗 and a sausage pizza 🍕 and they were amazing!  Totally would come again if I’m in Chicago again
Great pizza and service!
Love love love !!!

Stix n Brix is a great addition to the Armour Square/Bridgeport dining scene! The restaurant serves wood-fired personal pizzas with a good mix of the classics (Pepperoni and Sausage) and more unique (the Fig & Pig pizza we had was a white pizza with fig jam, fresh mozzarella, prosciutto, and shaved parmesan and was incredible!). They also have great salads and a wide selection of beverages. The restaurant has a cool, modern vibe with plenty of local art. Finally, all of the food is very reasonably priced; dinner for two with alcoholic drinks will end up being around $40.

Found this place on Google because another restaurant was full and we were starving...so glad we found this awesome place; not only was the staff extremely friendly and welcoming but their pizza was extremely delicious!!! Some of the best pizza I've had in a while, baked in a wood fire oven which gave the pizza such a great taste. I highly recommend this place to anyone that wants great food and service. Great for a date or even dinner with the family.
Amazing bruschetta

Good food. Reasonable prices. Neighborhood vibe. This place is great. And it was the first wood fired pizza place on the south side! We went on Valentine’s Day and they had some nice specials and we’re family friendly despite our messy one year old not being very romantic.
Great salad and sausage pizza. Great location. Crust not too thin or thick. Only critic is I prefer uncured pepperoni.
The best gluten free pizza I’ve ever had!
Excellent wood oven pizza and great service.
Great customer service! Really good food

This new restaurant in the Bridgeport neighborhood is perfect for a lunch/dinner date or just a meal alone for 1 and is very cost efficient! The staff here is so friendly and pleasant and don't mind answering your inquisitive questions. I went with their half Apple Salad & Grilled Chicken Stubbies and it was AMAZING. Make sure you finish it off with 2-3 scoops of gelato (Vanilla & Strawberry were my favs!) I can't wait to try other options on their menu!

I NEVER leave reviews, but wow. Amazing place! Phenomenal pizza!! Perfectly cooked,  not overly greasy and sloppy. The strawberry tarts were great too. They are very prompt with any questions or concerns. Love this place!

Tried the one at the top of the pizza menu and it was good. Nice crispy thin crust of the right amount of times baking and the toppings were unique in my experience. The only flaw would be not enough in terms of quantity but I would definitely visit there several more times.
Foods are good and delicious! 👍Coffee not to my taste.👎 Comfortable environment, nice and clean.
Pretty good...
Great place
My family and I love this place!!! The food is amazing and the service is great.
Amazing burrata and Pizza. Loved the mood and the wait staff!
Got the sausage pizza, it was amazing.
You should definitely check this out the pizza is sooo good!
Impeccable service, delicious pizza, fresh quality ingredients!
Very good food and good service.  I'll be back.
A great neighborhood place.  The menu is limited. The food is good. Service is good. Comfortable place.
Great place, fun atmosphere, friendly staff. All around fantastic.

This place is amazing. Awesome pizzas with great flavors. So far we have had, the Fig and Pig, Sausage, Prosciutto and Arugula and the Slicy Beef. All were perfectly made, crust is crisp, yet slightly Chewy! Will be a regular!
Friendly service.  Excellent food! Refreshing from the normal establishments

Finally some thin crust brick oven pizza on the south side. Small menu and everything was good, staff friendly, prices reasonable. The music was really loud, so ownership - when it's not a game day turn it down a bit.
Excellent service, and great food! Their pizza crust was the bomb.
Absolutely delicious pizza. Got the margherita pizza and the potato pizza and both were superb.
Great food, great service. What more can you ask for? Arugula and prosciutto pizza was top notch.
Yummy!
Great oven baked pizza spot.  The pizza and apps are great, but make sure you save room for dessert, the pastry chef is top notch.
Great authentic pizza. Very friendly service
Amazing food, very friendly staff and a beautiful location. We will definitely be back again!
The staff was incredibly friendly and knowledgeable. The hot beef and giardiniera pizza is a must try. This place is a new neighborhood gem. :)

If you like wood-fired pizza, friendly service, and a cozy atmosphere, this place is for you. It's new to the neighborhood but service and food quality has been consistent since they opened. Their margherita pizza is a solid introduction, or go for the arugula and prosciutto if you want something fancier. BYOB if you want a glass of wine or beer, and you've got a good date night.
The greeting, the wait staff, the kitchen staff and the food...all = amazing! A hidden jem
The BURRATA was everything!!!! All the 4 pizza’s we ordered were incredie. It’s byob and on Tuesday’s it’s 1/2 price pizza!!!!
Good pizza and great service.

This place is Awesome !! Service is outstanding you walk in your greeted with a smile.  The oven Pizza is something to brag about  everything was very well organized and super clean .  Even the owner came by to make sure we where having a good time .  I will definitely come back with more friends .

Great place, the decor is very casual and welcoming. We started with the bruschetta which was the best I have ever had. They make their own bread in house and it’s toasted in the brick oven. This gave the bread a nice chew without being overly hard. The pizzas are personal size so we ordered the margherita and Italian beef with hot giardiniera. The crust was amazing, crispy, and didn’t get soggy. The Italian beef was excellent and the giardiniera was hot but not overpowering. The margherita pizza has just the right amount of basil and the sauce was very flavorful. We came in to check this place out and it will now be our weekly tradition!  Great place!

Simply superb pizza, the best I've found on the south side. Flavorful, refreshing marinara, accomplished use of herbs and light seasoning, and excellent crust. Also a very, very good place during the day (at the attached Red Line 33 cafe) for sandwiches, smoothies and baked goods too. Coffee still a bit of a work in progress but given the exceptional standard of everything else I'm sure it will be there soon.

Finally. A place offering something other than the same old same old. Great salad, appetizer, and desert offerings, and THE BEST brick oven pizza I've ever had. Wait staff and management were super courteous and gave us some BOGO coupons for our next visit, which will be very soon. A bonus is the adjacent Red Line Cafe which has sandwiches, pastries, coffee and espresso drinks. A great addition to the neighborhood.
Pizzas good, light and fluffy dough. Appetizers are solid too, nice and modern combination of Italian classics.

Thank God. Best pizza in the neighborhood. If you are from Bridgeport, you’ve been heart broken by the slump in quality our local staples have taken in their pizzas. Not this place. I’m really impressed. First off limited menu, I’m talking like 6, maybe 9 different pizza, which I proudly have tried all of them. Every pizza is personal, as in 10-12 inches, and is plenty. I’m pretty traditional as far as pizza toppings, but my favorite was the prosciutto and fig. They use a brick oven, so pizzas are done quickly. They do not serve beer yet, but speaking with the owner, their plan is to serve local brews only. My new favorite spot by far.

If you live in or ever visit Bridgeport, this place is a must do!  Excellent wood fired pizza and pesto injected Burrata; the prosciutto was a nice touch.  Even better than Ravenswood’s highly touted Spaca Napoli.  The crust is light and airy with a bit of crunch and the sauce is fresh and light with the right amount of sausage.  Great balance.  Excellent service.  Nicely done!
Amazing pizza, rapid and friendly service, and good music! Definitely making this a regular spot.
